attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reinstate Prof David Nutt, the Ex chairman of the ACMD.  Prof Nutt was removed from his role as Chairman because of his comments regarding the Gov. and the drug laws, even though this is as stated in the mandate of the ACMD, his job as chairman and figurehead of the ACMD.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
